name: Reviewbucket Lite – Emoji reaction review and google place review WordPress Plugin
author: WPBucket

sections.description:
Reviewbucketlite is the plugin which allow you to display google reviews on your site from google using api. Also this plugin provide emoji reaction review feature. You could use emoji reaction review option on you post, page, product page or service page to get user reaction like facebook post reaction. This plugin helps you to increase your user confidence and trust.

Free Version Features

  1. Google place review api integrated to show google review
  2. Emoji reaction review options
  3. Allow user to provide emoji reaction
  4. 4 Different review showcase style
  5. Responsive Layout
  6. Support Elementor Page Builder
  7. Support WP Bakery Page Builder
  8. Support shortcode for all type of reviews
  9. Nice settings options
  10. Easy shortcode generate options
  11. Translation ready
  12. Easy to use it in both Free and Premium WordPress Themes
  13. Unlimited update

Pro Version Features

  1. Allow you to Display Multiple Platforms Reviews
  2. Allow you to Display Push Notification
  3. Google rating Push Notification
  4. Custom Push Notification
  5. Google place review api integrated to show google review
  6. Facebook api integrated to show facebook review
  7. Yelp api integrated to show yelp review
  8. Custom review create options
  9. Any kind of review create and show options
  10. Emoji reaction review options
  11. Allow user to provide reaction
  12. Different type of review style
  13. Responsive Layout
  14. Support Elementor Page Builder
  15. Support WP Bakery Page Builder
  16. Support shortcode for all type of reviews
  17. Nice settings options
  18. Easy shortcode generate options
  19. Translation ready
  20. Easy to use it in both Free and Premium WordPress Themes
  21. Well Online Documentation
  22. Free Unlimited update

How to use:-
very easy to use,after active plugin just go to Dashboard -> Review Bucket Settings . You will find all settings to use.

Live Preview

♛ Buy Now Reviewbucket Pro version
sections.installation:
The easy way.

Go to your WordPress Dashboard. Navigate to Plugins > Add New and then search for “ReviewBucket Lite”. Click on Install and then Activate the Plugin.

That’s it, ReviewBucket Lite Plugin is now activated on your site!

The hard way..

Download “ReviewBucket Lite WordPress Plugin” and then extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatable on latest wordpress and elementor version ?

Yes
